name: Smash Hit!
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 51!
Hit the targets that change every 10 seconds with your hammer(s)!
Theme Relevance
Since the aim of the game is to adapt to the changing and increasingly difficult target every 10 seconds, we feel the core mechanic resonates strongly with the theme of the jam.
Credits
Munsterplop - Programmer
 
Tuile - Artist and Game Designer
 
SFX generated by Tuile using https://sfxr.me
 
Soundtrack Credit: Biogas by Defrini (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/defrini/single/biogas/)
 
Control Scheme
 
← or → arrow keys
 
RMB and LMB
 
or the A and D to play!
Tutorial
